Game: Build-A-Bear Workshop- Welcome to Hugsville Welcome to Hugsville! Welcome to Hugsville! Build-A-Bear Workshop mascots Bearemy and Pawlette Coufur guide you throughout this open-ended adventure. Explore the world, decorate your home, play games, or chat with friends! Features • 13 playable furry friends to choose from and customize• Go on quests, build and create, play local wireless mini-games with your furry friends, and more!• 5 different "Fun Zones" featuring mini-games, including the Beach, Forest, Jungle, Desert and Icecap.• Collect items to unlock new gameplay and rewards. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/903360f3-57c5-499c-8b0c-b1f5369ddecc.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/9804e0ba-d0b1-494d-b3b7-58fbc1e3e7b4.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/92132fca-6b5c-4716-81ae-71db54d44128.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/6ab30102-44fc-49cc-a0bb-eaba629c4e88.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/eb960af3-4608-4682-b325-ac260ec06fe5.png E - Everyone
